Articles.Content:
After playing with designs a little bit, I have made a quad winged biplane thingy that is incredibly stable, maneuverable, and has plenty of fuel. I guess you could switch out the engine, if you wanted. ;D

ENJOY.

You\'re correct. This thing flies like a dream.

As for why it\'s so stable, my best guess is simple wing spamming. The amount of wings you put on this thing make it behave most like a jet I have ever seen in KSP. Nice find.
